modName: Dovahska - The town of peace between dragons and humans
summary:
This mod adds a small flying city called Dovahska to Skyrim.
It\'s a city of peace between humans and dragons!
At the moment there is one peaceful dragon, but I try to add rideable dragons tomorrow!
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTENT:
We are one step closer to make rideable dragons!
The dragons aren\'t include yet cause they make a lot of troubles but I we hope we\'ll add them in the next update! Look at the pictures! :-)


In a seperate file u can ride a dragon, but this may not work! Please send me a PM if it work by you! The dragon can be found on the way from the Guardian Stones to Riverwood!


This is only the alpha version!

This mod adds a small flying city called Dovahska to Skyrim.
It\'s a city of peace between humans and dragons!
At the moment there is one peaceful dragon, but I try to add rideable dragons tomorrow!
There aren\'t any quests at the moment! The city isn\'t done yet!
The idea was from The Infernal City by Greg Keyes (http://www.goodreads.com/book/show/6488043-the-infernal-city)
You can find the city over the Lake Ilinalta.

News:

MendedWing joined the team! 
Meneer Zondervan joined the team!
meristematic joined the team!

I think it\'s now a group project we\'re working on :D


Planned features:

-More buildings
-Quests
-a complete landing field for dragons
-rideable dragons


Teaser:

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6nol2eQvTXk&feature=youtu.be]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6nol2eQvTXk&feature=youtu.be[/url]

A little making of from our netherland team member :)

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I6v1ntwIbHA]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I6v1ntwIbHA[/url]

Known bugs:
I don\'t know how to fix it... If you have an idea, please send me a PM :)


[URL=http://s14.directupload.net/file/d/2804/kscpd55e_jpg.htm][IMG]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120218/temp/kscpd55e.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


Please report ANY bugs you can find ;)

I\'m looking for a mod-creator! If you can add quests into this town send me a PM :-)
author: skylight
